mapper.select: SELECT ia.id, ia.username, ia.phone, ia.email, ia.password, ia.nickname, ia.is_enabled FROM iam_account ia WHERE ia.phone = #{phone}
SELECT it.id, it.name FROM iam_tenant it WHERE it.id IN (SELECT iam.iam_tenant_id FROM iam_account_manage iam WHERE iam.iam_account_id = #{accountId})
SELECT ir.id, ir.name FROM iam_role ir WHERE exists(SELECT 1 FROM iam_account_role_rel iarr WHERE iarr.iam_account_id = #{accountId} AND ir.id = iarr.iam_role_id) AND ir.iam_tenant_id = #{tenantId}
